modShortDescription: Allows you to swap bolts and arrows at will.
modDescription:
Allows you to swap [bolts](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-ammo/) and arrows at will.

**[Download](https://cdgroup.org/files/7dtd/Arrow-XbowConversion.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25810-a20-modlets-30k-stacks-arrow-xbow-ammo-swap-ammo-disassemble/).

**Credits:** [Elucidus](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/elucidus/)
